rules_text:
[i](As a Siege enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You and others can attack it. When it's defeated, exile it, then cast it transformed.)[/i]
When Fall of a Consoul enters the battlefield, destroy target creature with power 4 or greater.
rules_text2:
As an additional cost to cast Rapid Rejuvenation exile X cards from your graveyard.
Return target creature with mana value X from a graveyard to the battlefield under your control.
